short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser plugin to make the work from the operators smooth.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Salesforce experience with Smooth Operator, the essential Chrome plugin that ensures every sales opportunity is just a click away. Designed to streamline your workflow and maximize efficiency, Smooth Operator intelligently identifies phone numbers within Salesforce that aren't linked and instantly converts them into clickable call-to-action links.

How It Works? The plugin automatically scans for unlinked phone numbers and converts them into clickable links. Click on any phone number link to initiate calls directly, making your sales process smoother and more efficient.

In the fast-paced world of sales, every second counts. Smooth Operator is designed to make your job smoother by ensuring you're always just a click away from your next successful call. Upgrade your Salesforce experience and empower your sales team to achieve more with Smooth Operator.
